author: esjewett
msg: [ESME-321] Fixes Log deprecation warnings by moving to the Loggable mixin trait, and fixes .first deprecation warnings in the API2Test.scala code

author: antelder
msg: Rename the tuscany plugin 'launch' mojo to be named 'shell' and update it to run the tuscany shell. So now you can run the shell without needing to get any Tuscany distribution by using: mvn org.apache.tuscany.maven.plugins:maven-tuscany-plugin:2.0-SNAPSHOT:shell
